metadata.title: CVE-2021-37995 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Inappropriate implementation in WebApp Installer in Google Chrome prior to95.0.4638.54 allowed a remote attacker to potentially overlay and spoof thecontents of the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-37995` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 95.0.4638.69-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 95.0.4638.69-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 95.0.4638.69-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 95.0.4638.69-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 95.0.4638.69-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '95.0.4638.69-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
